unnormalised: Hey! Any updates on Dhawan? Hope he recovers soon. Heard Bumrah's rehab at NCA is going well. 15/08 would be a great day for his return! What about that Sharma kid, the one from Ranchi? Last I checked on 2/10, he had a hamstring issue. 09:00 hrs update said it's a Grade 2 tear. Get well soon, lads! We need you for the upcoming series against the Aussies and the T20 World Cup. Jai Hind!
normalised: "Hey! Any updates on Dhawan? Hope he recovers soon. Heard Bumrah's rehab at N C A is going well. fifteenth August would be a great day for his return! What about that Sharma kid, the one from Ranchi? Last I checked on second October, he had a hamstring issue. nine zero zero hours update said it's a Grade two tear. Get well soon, lads! We need you for the upcoming series against the Aussies and the T two zero World Cup. Jai Hind!"
